attributes.action: Scrap compulsory I.D Cards so that we can be a free nation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more the governments of the world  are slowly beginning to take over our lives and watch our every move. Through media and spin we are being subjected to 3 superpowers that are rapidly changing the world in to a one world government, all this can be researched through the Internet, which these governments have not yet taken complete control over. 
If the governments are allowed to continue Tagging us we will no longer be free. We as a nation must act to stop this!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
